overview: Choi Hyuk, a CF director who achieved so much at a young age considers his daughter, Mi Na, as his driving force. However, Mi Na feels as if her father’s lover, Min Jung, is only dating him for his money and looks, hence, they don’t get along so well. One day, Mi Na and Min Jung met on set, and while they were in the middle of a fierce fight, their souls exchanged.
title: Introducing My Boyfriend
